description: Try our easy to follow Gingerbread Glazed Donuts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Gingerbread Glazed Donuts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Jim Beam White Label Bourbon (optional)
1 tsp Queen Finest Madagascar Vanilla Bean Paste

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven 160Â°C fan forced. Grease 2 donut baking pans.
Sift flour, cornflour, baking powder and spices into a large bowl. Stir through sugar.

Melt butter, syrup and orange zest in small saucepan over low heat. Remove from heat. Add milk and eggs, whisk to combine. Add butter mixture to dry ingredients. Spoon into piping bag and pipe into donut pans.
Bake 9-10 mins or until a skewer inserted into donuts comes out clean. Place on wire rack to cool.

Chocolate glaze: stir sugar in a small saucepan over med-high heat 2-3 mins. Remove from heat and add milk. Return pan to low heat, add chocolate (and bourbon) stir 2-3 mins. Cool slightly before glazing.

Vanilla glaze: sieve icing sugar into bowl, add buttermilk, vanilla and lemon juice. Whisk until smooth. Set aside for 5 mins for glaze to thicken slightly. Divide mixture between two bowls, tint one with red food colouring.

Glaze donuts selecting between dark chocolate, red and vanilla glazes. Decorate with drizzled melted chocolate, sprinkles, cachous and grated white chocolate to suit. Refrigerate for 10 mins for glazes to set before serving.
